patthana19.7:1.1_0: Napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri.
patthana19.7:2.1_0: Nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri.
patthana19.7:3.1_0: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana19.7:3.1_1: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
